Text: Hello young man..
Hello.
Hello again!
Hello.

Tell me about it

Well, I have to enter the castle, but the guards don`t let me in..
Hmmm. Why do you want to enter there? Didn`t you hear about corona curse?
You should be. The king has fallen ill and many his subject also. I can be very contagious.
We are looking after the cure. Would you help me find some ingriedients?
Ask2: Well, I dont` have time for it right now.>False>0,9

Text: Good. Listen carefully I won`t repeat! Bring me: Sunsuet Flower, Mad Bat Wing and Gremlin tooth! Bring them to me and we will see If we can manage a fine cure! Go by the boat southeast of the city to the land of five elements!
Well It`s seems to be a very contagious disease, affects mostly adults and elder ones. Our king has fallen ill a week ago. No one is safe!
We are looking after the cure. Would you help me with some ingriedients?
Ask2: Well, I dont` have time for it right now.>False>0,9

Text: Hmm, come back then later.. If we will be still alive..
Hmm, come back if you have all of them! Remember: Sunset Flower, Mad Bat Wing and Gremlin tooth.   Take the boat and travel to Land of Five Elements!

Argh... I`m think I`ve fallen the curse... Arghh...     (it`s looks like the Druid has fever, cough and   shortness of breathe..) I can`t help you more...  Arghh... Go and find Karol the elf in sacred     land of five elements, then open the magic gate   to castle with this key!...
Event: quest Open the Gates has been completed

Text: I`ll try!!! Please hold on!

Text: Argh.... Go... remember.. Karol... Five Elements... Argh... (he looks very poor.)

Ok. Thank`s to your help we are something better, but the curse didn`t gone forever. Try to find out from where it`s come from. I`ve heard about the mystery dungeon on the north part of the island. Go there and explore. You will found the boat on the north side of the castle. Good Luck!
Goodbye!
See you next time!
